# Getting started with R

## Required reading

You are required to read and complete all the exercises in Chapters 1, 3, and 4 of: 

Quantitative skills for biology [Link](https://ahurford.github.io/quantitative-training-guide/)

When you are finished you should have `R` and `RStudio` installed on your computer, or you should be familar with running `RStudio Cloud`.

## Questions
1. Write 1 paragraph describing your experience completing the the exercises.
